Ltd February 2012  –  May 2013  (1 year 4 months) Islamabad Nayatel is the first ISP in South Asia to provide FTTH in pakistan, providing triple play services(Voice, video,data). I am working as a Senior Network Engineer in IP/MPLS CORE and my job roles are as follows: 
 
•	Managing a team of engineers to ensure proper work flow in IP Core. 
•	Hands on experience on Cisco 7600 series Routers, 6500 series Switches, 7200 series BRASes, 3500, 3700, 2900, 2800 series Routers & Switches. . 
•	Planning, Designing & Implementation of BRAS Extension Project with Juniper. 
•	Gain extensive knowledge about DSL services/ FTTU triple services which include but is not limited to router configurations, hardware/software installations, OLT, ONT, IP MUX and to meet any other specific requirements of the customer. 
•	On time provisioning of Layer-2/Layer-3 MPLS VPNs in conformance with the Departmental SOP for VPN Installations on Cisco 7609 routers. 
•	Solution provisioning including network designing and deployment for large scale Enterprises. 
•	Ensuring smooth operations of VOIP customers by maintaining GRE Tunnels, Route-maps/ Star gate (VOIP over the Internet), including BRAS end configurations. 
•	Developing Low Level Design (LLD), Network Implementation Plan (NIP), and Network Ready for Use (NRFU). 
•	Implementing projects as per LLD & NTP and escalating any project related issues to the Manager. 
•	Troubleshooting user authentication and bandwidth problems for ADSL, Lease Lines and Fiber infrastructure. 
•	Proficiency in drawing Visio diagrams for better understanding of customer and Core network scenarios. 
•	Updating DSL router’s firmware i.e DD-WRT to enhance options and efficiency. 
•	Advance level trouble shooting of customer complaints/issues regarding DSL/triple Nayatel Pvt. 
Ltd services with proper and complete notification/ Information on trouble ticket of MBL/NTL.
